newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Union firm buys 49.9 pct of Rennies unit.
newsitem.headline: Union firm buys 49.9 pct of Rennies unit.

text.p: South African Rail and Harbour Workers Union (Sarhwu) Investments Holdings Ltd said on Friday it had acquired a 49.9 percent interest in Rent-A-Bakkie Holdings from Safmarine and Rennies Holdings Ltd for an undisclosed sum.
It had struck the deal in partnership with Ogwini Marine (Pty) Ltd and Enterprising Women Investment Holdi the company said in a statement.

The firm said it had also been granted an option to increase its stake to 51 percent after the first anniversary of the effective date of the acquisition -- July 1 1997. On the third anniversary it could increase its stake to 75 percent minus one vote.
Rent-A-Bakkie operates a network of 22 branches from which it hires out one ton delivery units to 23 ton truck-tractor-trailer combinations.
Sarhwum Investment Holdings added that various opportunities had been identified for co-operation and development in the public and private sector.
